Articles.Content:
Just to say hello....

Maybe also to ask how I can edit my signature so I can post all my nummy ribbons.

Poor Kerbals getting shot into space without enough fuel to get home....

Hello.

You have to have 5 or more posts before you can have a sig or avatar.

Hi,

I'm new too.

Don't worry about stranding Kerbals in space, it's far better than pounding them into lunar dustÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ which is how I kill most of mine.

T

Welcome to the community Jollyroger6969

If yourself or you turbo917k need any help killing Kerbals, er I mean reaching the Mun, feel free to ask
Welcome. Go easy on the Kerbals

Welcome to the community Jollyroger6969

If yourself or you turbo917k need any help killing Kerbals, er I mean reaching the Mun, feel free to ask

Well.. Im not exactly -new- new.... Been playing demo for a bit now and just got the full version as soon as .22 came out.

Just started leaving the Kerbin system and am in the process of designing my very first interplanetary craft that comes with a detachable lander.
Detaching is easy, reattaching, that takes some practice, and I'd like to see it when it's done

Detaching is easy, reattaching, that takes some practice, and I'd like to see it when it's done

Absolutly!! I'm looking into how to make vids of my travels so I can post em here... They are bound to get a laugh or heckle out of most of my fellow Kerbalnauts. (Is that what we are or are we Kerbinauts?)

Welcome to the community Jollyroger6969

If yourself or you turbo917k need any help killing Kerbals, er I mean reaching the Mun, feel free to ask

Thanks for the offer!

T
